title: Final Project Face Masks
name: README
description: This project is an exploration of Twitter posts about face masks in Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Germany. The posts have been scraped from Twitter, using the Rtweet-package, 5 times in total. The data is to be found in the folder 'data', the scraping script and analysis script in the 'scripts'-folder and finally different schemes and graphs made by running the script in the 'Data Output'-folder. This project is under a MIT license, which can be read in the 'LICENSE'-file. For further questions, please contact: au618959@uni.au.dk
